com.philips.lighting.hue.sdk.utilities

Class PHDateTimePattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.philips.lighting.hue.sdk.utilities.PHDateTimePattern

  • public class PHDateTimePattern
extends java.lang.Object
    PHDateTimeInterval class - Helper class to convert Time and date formats to bridge format. Supported string formats: - Absolute time [YYYY]-[MM]-[DD]T[hh]:[mm]:[ss] [YYYY]-[MM]-[DD]T[hh]:[mm]:[ss]A[hh]:[mm]:[ss] (randomized) attributes: timeZone, date, randomTime - Recurring time W[bbb]/T[hh]:[mm]:[ss] W[bbb]/T[hh]:[mm]:[ss]A[hh]:[mm]:[ss] (randomized) attributes: timeZone, date, randomTime, recurringDays - Time interval T[hh]:[mm]:[ss]-T[hh]:[mm]:[ss] attributes: timeZone, timeInterval - Recurring time interval W[bbb]/T[hh]:[mm]:[ss]-T[hh]:[mm]:[ss] attributes: timeZone, timeInterval, recurringDays - Timer PT[hh]:[mm]:[ss] PT[hh]:[mm]:[ss]A[hh]:[mm]:[ss] attributes: timeZone, timer, randomTime, recurringDays - Recurring timer R[nn]/PT[hh]:[mm]:[ss] R[nn]/PT[hh]:[mm]:[ss]A[hh]:[mm]:[ss] (randomized) attributes: timeZone, timer, recurringTimerInterval, randomTime Based on ISO8601:2004
